b: ^You approch toward a young lady dressed in a long green and white robe wearing the insign of Io, the temple of life
^She look at you shyly, her eyes darting around, awkwardly searching for words
^Ah erm, well, hello you're here for the tower?
^Yes of course you are, Saria come on...
^Erm anyway, my name is Saria, I'm a prietress of life, nice to meet you!

c-0: ^Io is the god of life and prosperity, as her disciples we are taught to cure wound and ailment
^As a prietress I am able to instill back like energy, there is however limits on what I can do
^Life magic is not able to regrow an arm or give you back your blood, so be careful okay?
c-1: ^Thank you! lead the way I will be behind you
c-2: ^Y-yes I will be here if you're looking for help
